articles.description: TUI's boss suggested Spain could be open for Brits this summer
articles.content:
Holiday operator TUI has shared an update on summer holidays and which countries Brits will most likely be able to visit.
Many European destinations popular with UK holidaymakers have announced plan… [+1610 chars]
